stories.text:
Personalised email outreach is a core part of any marketing/growth professional's job.

While email marketing tools such as Mailchimp, SendInBlue are great to send Marketing Campaigns to thousands of recipients, sending personalised emails have a different impact on end users.

If you're looking to send hundreds of mass emails from your gmail account, I have built a tool for you.

It's called Pigeonmail.co

Add-on link: https://workspace.google.com/marketplace/app/pigeon_mail_mail_merge_for_gmail/963290025925?ref=producthunt

It's a Google Sheet Add-on that connects with your Gmail and sends emails from your own Gmail account.

Here's why you might like it -

* Personalise email content

* Add Emojis on the emails

* Add Attachments on emails

* Track email opens, bounces

* Works really fast

* Privacy Friendly - We do not store any data at all (Audited & Approved by Google)

* Send upto 600 emails/day using Free Gmail and upto 2000 emails/day using Paid Google Workspace Email

* Tool is free to use

I launched on PH yesterday and the community loved it. https://www.producthunt.com/posts/pigeon-mail-3I would love feedback and support from this community. If you like the tool, please support by leaving a rating on the Google Workspace Marketplace.
stories.title: Show HN: PigeonMail – Send hundreds of personalised emails from Gmail

stories.text: This question probably comes up regularly, It's time to revisit it. I'd like read the classics and the cutting edge novel takes on marketing. It's been quite difficult to approach the subject because... all the marketing fluff.
